title: Street Fighter Alpha Anthology [PS2][NTSC]
description:
Street Fighter Alpha Anthology [PS2][NTSC]


Includes:

	Street Fighter Alpha

	Street Fighter Alpha 2

	Street Fighter Alpha 2 Gold

	Street Fighter Alpha 3

	Super Gem Fighter: Mini Mix


Description and Review:

	 <a href="
http://www.gamespot.com/ps2/action/sfaanthology/index.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.gamespot.com/ps2/action/sfaanthology/index.html</a>



Note:

	Please make sure that you have either a mod chipped PS2 console or an original SWAP MAGIC disc (http://www.swapmagic3.com/). If you haven&#039;t got either one of these, this game will NOT work on your PS2.

	This game has already been rebuilt.



Instructions:


	1. Unpack the .7z file using WinRAR (or 7zip)

	2. You should get an .iso file that is approx. 2gb in size.

	3. Burn this file at 4x speed using your favourite DVD burning program (Nero is good). 

	4. Play the game.
